task.title: Import XLIFF File
task.shortdesc: Steps for importing translated XLIFF files into a JavaPM project.

step.cmd: In File menu, select Open JavaPM Project.
Locate and open the JavaPM project to be updated.
In Tasks menu, select Import Translations from XLIFF.
Locate and open the translated XLIFF file to import.

taskbody.result: JavaPM incorporates all approved translations from the selected XLIFF file into the corresponding .properties files of the project.
